function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of isolation space for individuals with COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of spreading the disease to others in the household","Mitigation":"Creating a designated isolation space with proper ventilation and lighting","Technologies":"Modular spacing system and panelled moveable facade or wall","People":"Individuals with COVID-19, household members","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, designers"},{"Description":"Inadequate relaxation space for mental and physical health","Impact":"Increased stress and decreased physical and mental well-being","Mitigation":"Designating specific areas for relaxation, such as verandah, terrace, or green corners","Technologies":"Design and layout planning for relaxation spaces","People":"Residents, individuals affected by COVID-19","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, designers"},{"Description":"Risk of poor neighborhood hygiene","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the community","Mitigation":"Implementing neighborhood hygiene maintenance protocols, such as waste management and sanitation","Technologies":"Community waste management systems, sanitation facilities","People":"Community members, public health authorities","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"}]}
